title: Kaweco Perkeo Rollerball Pen—Breezy Teal
description:
The Kaweco Perkeo Rollerball Breezy Teal offers a modern design for your start in the world of handwriting no matter what age. Visually, the octagonal cap and the 16-sided barrel harmonize perfectly with each other, as the surfaces at the different angles create a unique play of light and shadow. But the Kaweco Perkeo Breezy Teal has more to offer than just its look: The ergonomic grip section and its low weight support the posture and allow fatigue-proof writing fun.

Absolutely convincing, besides the adequate price, is the quality of the rollerball. This makes the Rollerball ideal for beginners in school or the field of high-quality writing. Breezy Teal brings harmony and serenity to the paper with a soft yet cool petrol shade. The color is a low saturated mixture of blue and green. Thus, the rollerball appeals pleasing and natural.

The Kaweco Perkeo Rollerball includes a black EURO Refill in a stroke width of 0.7 mm.

  • Dimensions: 5.5 in.
  • Materials: Rollerball writing system
